name: Critical Orbit
description:
Credits:

  • Mateusz Kaczoruk
  • Bartosz Pawlak
  • Paula Pszczoła
Controls:
  • Y - activate asteroid
  • Right Analog - asteroid rotation
  • Left Trigger - Shoot
  • Right Trigger - Push
  • Left Bumper - Slow down
  • Right Bumper - Speed up
  • A - accept
  • B - cancel
  • D-Pad - change weapon and upgrade navigation
